verbose_text: However, in two of these studies transfer of the human TM domain to African green monkey (agm), murine, or rat BST-2 did not restore sensitivity to Vpu while in a third study transfer of the human BST-2 TM domain into agm and rhesus BST-2 resulted in gain of Vpu sensitivity.
evidence: BST-2 did not restore sensitivity to Vpu
